query:
UPDATE conversations
            SET
                sender_last_seen_at = CASE
                    WHEN sender_id = $2 THEN NOW()
                    ELSE sender_last_seen_at
                END,
                receiver_last_seen_at = CASE
                    WHEN receiver_id = $2 THEN NOW()
                    ELSE receiver_last_seen_at
                END
            WHERE
                id = $1 AND $3;
